snippet.title: AMBER HEARD POSTS A SEXY PHOTO ON SOCIAL MEDIA AMID TROPICAL VACATION
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Posts Instagram Picture Showing Off Backside In White Swimsuit The actress is taking a tropical vacation after launching herself in her film career and philanthropic causes.

Amber Heard was seen on vacation wearing a white bathing suit, showing her assets for a portrait taken and posted on her official Instagram. The film star added in the caption: "Sometimes a sign appears" in the photograph where she is seen hugging a palm tree with her hair in two French braids during her tropical vacation.

The Texas native is currently dating Heidi Klum's ex-boyfriend, Vito Schnabel, according to Us Weekly. He ended an intermittent relationship with Elon Musk in February 2018. Prior to his relationship with Musk, Heard was married to actor Johnny Depp from 2015-2017.

That marriage ended with the actress of the Justice League accusing Depp in April 2017 of appearing at his birthday party on April 22 "drunk and drugged." She stated that "she threw me violently to the floor" after grabbing her by the hair, as reported by Variety.

Variety reported that in May 2016, Tillet Wright, a mutual friend of the couple, called 911 at the actress' request. According to Heard, the conversation began very normally, but then Depp "began to obsess about something that was not true and his behavior changed drastically". Heard said: "Johnny grabbed the cell phone, rolled his arm like a baseball pitcher and threw the cell phone, hitting my cheek and my eye with great force," Heard said. "Then he forcibly pulled my hair back while trying to get off the couch ... Johnny kept yelling at me, pulling my hair, hitting me and grabbing me violently in the face."

Since separating from Depp, Heard has thrown herself into her film career and her charitable work. He is currently defending the cause of a 12-year-old Syrian refugee named Weam. "She is currently suffering from a fatal illness and desperately needs our help," the actress said on Instagram.

Amber explained to her millions of followers that the girl "needs a blood transfusion" and that her medical care was expensive. She has partnered with Crowdrise to help pay the girl's medical bills. On the official Heard website, she wrote: "She lives in the Zaatari refugee camp in Jordan and suffers from thalassemia, a genetic blood disorder. The day I met her, her father took her to the SAMS center in Zaatari Camp because she he had fainted and he felt weak. "

"To save his life, he needs blood transfusions every 20 days and iron chelation (oral medications) every day." The cost of this life-long treatment is around $ 900 per month, and his family can not afford it. transfusion from a local NGO, but due to budget cuts, Weam has not been able to receive treatment in the last two months, "Heard said.

So far, Heard's efforts have raised more than $ 10,000 for the cause.
